description: Retrieves the details of a blueprint.

nested_items.name: Blueprint
nested_items.description: Returns a Blueprint object.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the blueprint.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the blueprint.

nested_items.name: CreatedOn
nested_items.description: The date and time the blueprint was registered.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedOn
nested_items.description: The date and time the blueprint was last modified.

nested_items.name: ParameterSpec
nested_items.description: A JSON string that indicates the list of parameter specifications for the blueprint.

nested_items.name: BlueprintLocation
nested_items.description: Specifies the path in Amazon S3 where the blueprint is published.

nested_items.name: BlueprintServiceLocation
nested_items.description: Specifies a path in Amazon S3 where the blueprint is copied when you call CreateBlueprint/UpdateBlueprint to register the blueprint in Glue.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the blueprint registration.
Creating -- The blueprint registration is in progress.
Active -- The blueprint has been successfully registered.
Updating -- An update to the blueprint registration is in progress.
Failed -- The blueprint registration failed.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: An error message.

nested_items.name: LastActiveDefinition
nested_items.description: When there are multiple versions of a blueprint and the latest version has some errors, this attribute indicates the last successful blueprint definition that is available with the service.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the blueprint.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedOn
nested_items.description: The date and time the blueprint was last modified.

nested_items.name: ParameterSpec
nested_items.description: A JSON string specifying the parameters for the blueprint.

nested_items.name: BlueprintLocation
nested_items.description: Specifies a path in Amazon S3 where the blueprint is published by the Glue developer.

nested_items.name: BlueprintServiceLocation
nested_items.description: Specifies a path in Amazon S3 where the blueprint is copied when you create or update the blueprint.
